#summary Layout of the Database

= Introduction =

Tome uses PostgreSQL 8.1.10.

New developers can look here for information about what tables there are, what goes in each table, ...


= Details =
  * books - the general information about a textbook
    * isbn
    * title
    * author
    * edition
  * checkouts - a list of all checkouts (filled or not filled)
    * tomebook
    * semester
    * checkout
    * checkin
    * comments
    * library
    * uid
    * id
    * borrower
  * classbooks
  * classes
  * db_version
  * libraries
  * library_access
  * patrons
  * reservations
  * semesters
  * sessions
    * id (character-32; not null)
    * a_session (text; not null)
  * tomebooks
  * users
  * patron_classes
